game.title: Broforce
game.description: When evil threatens the world, the world calls on Broforce - an under-funded, over-powered paramilitary organization dealing exclusively in excessive force. Brace your loins with up to four players to run ‘n’ gun as dozens of different bros and eliminate the opposing terrorist forces that threaten our way of life. Unleash scores of unique weapons and set off incredible chain reactions of fire, napalm, and limbs in the name of freedom.

localized_description.text: When evil threatens the world, the world calls on Broforce - an under-funded, over-powered paramilitary organization dealing exclusively in excessive force. Brace your loins with up to four players to run ‘n’ gun as dozens of different bros and eliminate the opposing terrorist forces that threaten our way of life. Unleash scores of unique weapons and set off incredible chain reactions of fire, napalm, and limbs in the name of freedom.

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 《Broforce Forever》是2015年度最佳爱国游戏众所期待的免费更新，曾因莫须有罪名而无法投入热爱自由的玩家手中，现在则准时突破最高戒备的封锁，准备以大量肯塔基炸鸡式的腥风血雨迎战邪恶势力。
 
 本次最终更新将战役体验加以强化扩充，并加入新解锁内容、六位新登场的终极爱国兄弟、四个传播民主的新挑战关卡，还有军事力量的究极展现：修复错误！
 
 回归玩家享受本更新的最佳方式是重新玩一遍战役，然后再玩一遍，玩到天荒地老。 新兄弟报到 驾驭Seth Brondle（赛夫·搏朗斗）充满算计的高智商以及会吐酸的魅力，挥舞Xebro（锡搏）的飞空环刃，跟着弹奏动人音乐的扰乱分子Desperabro（亡命兄弟）用榴弹让恐怖主义长眠，或是成为怪物的恶梦：投掷木桩、净化不洁存在、自我复活的青少年Slayer（杀手）！
 
 如果狙击比较符合你的风格，知名的昆虫猎人Burt Brommer（勃尔特·勃罗默）能用可靠的步枪准确解放目标，Demolition Bro（爆破兄弟）的冰冻榴弹则能把恶人送回他们该去的地方，加以冰封。 新坏蛋登场 面对企图破坏自由的恶人时，兄弟才会成为战力。《Broforce Forever》的恐怖分子如今更加坚定，决心要摧毁民主体制。Motorbike Maniacs（摩托车狂徒）会想尽办法撞倒玩家，定点机枪、带刺铁丝、沙包、满载火箭弹的飞船则会彼此合作，让兄弟们每次前往占领地区出任务变得异常艰难。 新挑战降临 想找更大型战役的兄弟可以进入Muscle Temples（肌肉神殿），在这些新的挑战关卡中秀秀肌肉。每场战役中，各位印第安纳兄斯都必须闯过危险的神殿，克服新的威胁度、特定类型的敌人、各种危险。成功后即可解锁四项秀肌肉新能力的其中一种，让任何兄弟随时随地使用，就像行使自由一样。
 
  关于游戏 当邪恶威胁世界时,世界就会呼唤 Broforce,-一个资金不足但能力过硬、专门处理极端组织的准军事组织。 挺直腰板,与其他几十个兄弟一样奔跑、开火,消灭威胁到我们生活方式的恐怖主义。 释放数十种独特的武器,以自由之名掀起一系列对于火、烧夷弹、肢体等不可思议的连锁反应。 主要特色   兄贵力量：与其他几十个拥有特殊武器和独特攻击技巧的兄弟一样让世界感到对你的震惊和敬畏，在世界各地传播自由的福音。
   兄贵合作&死亡竞赛：在合作模式中与多达四位玩家一起对抗恐怖主义，或是断绝兄贵关系，在多种夸张的竞争模式中相互对峙。
   加入其他兄贵，在地区爆炸和大规模混乱的压力下穿越这些限时独特的攻击关卡。
   可破坏的地形提供了一系列战略选项，而正义爆炸红桶™简直可以一击扫清战场。
   运用强大的关卡编辑器，设计你自己的毁灭乐园，分享到网上成为其他兄贵嫉妒的焦点。浏览数十个用户创建的关卡，完成这些关卡并评估它们的兄贵力。

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 《Broforce Forever》是2015年度最佳愛國遊戲眾所期待的免費更新，曾因莫須有罪名而無法投入熱愛自由的玩家手中，現在則準時突破最高戒備的封鎖，準備以大量肯塔基酥炸式腥風血雨迎戰邪惡勢力。
 
 本次最終更新將戰役體驗加以強化擴充，並加入新解鎖內容、六位新登場的終極愛國兄弟、四個傳播民主的新挑戰關卡，還有軍事力量的究極展現：修復錯誤！
 
 回歸玩家享受本更新的最佳方式是重新玩一遍戰役，然後再玩一遍，玩到天荒地老。 新兄弟報到 駕馭Seth Brondle（賽夫．搏朗鬥）充滿算計的高智商以及會吐酸的魅力，揮舞Xebro（錫搏）的飛空環刃，跟著彈奏動人音樂的擾亂分子Desperabro（亡命兄弟）用榴彈讓恐怖主義長眠，或是成為怪物的惡夢：投擲木樁、淨化不潔存在、自我復活的青少年Slayer（殺手）！
 
 如果狙擊比較符合你的風格，知名的昆蟲獵人Burt Brommer（搏特．搏肉莫）能用可靠的步槍讓目標準確獲得解脫，Demolition Bro（爆破兄弟）的冰凍榴彈則能把惡人送回他們該去的地方，加以冰封。 新壞蛋登場 面對企圖破壞自由的惡人時，兄弟才會成為戰力。《Broforce Forever》的恐怖分子如今更加堅定，決心要摧毀民主體制。Motorbike Maniacs（摩托車狂徒）會想盡辦法撞倒玩家，定點機槍、帶刺鐵絲、沙包、滿載火箭彈的飛船則會彼此合作，讓兄弟們每次前往占領地區出任務變得異常艱難。 新挑戰降臨 想找更大型戰役的兄弟可以進入Muscle Temples（肌肉神殿），在這些新的挑戰關卡中秀秀肌肉。每場戰役中，各位印第安納．兄斯都必須闖過危險的神殿，克服新的威脅度、特定類型的敵人、各種危險。成功後即可解鎖四項秀肌肉新能力的其中一種，讓任何兄弟隨時隨地使用，就像行使自由一樣。
 
  關於此遊戲 當邪惡威脅世界時，世界就會呼喚Broforce，-一個資金不足但能力過硬、專門處理極端組織的准軍事組織。挺直腰板，與其他幾十個兄弟一樣奔跑、開火，消滅威脅到我們生活方式的恐怖主義。釋放數十種獨特的武器，以自由之名掀起一系列對於火、燒夷彈、肢體等不可思議的連鎖反應。 主要特色   與其他幾十個擁有特殊武器和獨特攻擊技巧的兄弟一樣讓世界感到對你的震驚和敬畏，在世界各地傳播自由的福音。
   在合作模式中與多達四位玩家一起對抗恐怖主義，或是斷絕兄貴關系，在多種誇張的競爭模式中相互對峙。
   入其他兄貴，在地區爆炸和大規模混亂的壓力下穿越這些限時獨特的攻擊關卡。
   可破壞的地形提供了一系列戰略選項，而正義爆炸紅桶™簡直可以一擊掃清戰場。
   運用強大的關卡編輯器，設計你自己的毀滅樂園，分享到網上成為其他兄貴嫉妒的焦點。瀏覽數十個用戶創建的關卡，完成這些關卡並評估它們的兄貴力。

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 Broforce Forever, the long-awaited free update to 2015’s most patriotic video game, held back from freedom-loving gamers for a crime it didn’t commit, has promptly escaped from a maximum security stockade and unleashes a megaton of Kentucky-fried carnage into the face of evil.
 
 The final update offers an improved and expanded campaign with new unlocks, along with six new ultra-patriotic bros, four new democracy-spreading challenge levels, and the ultimate expression of military might – bug fixes!
 
 The best way for a returning player to enjoy this is to play through the entire campaign again. And again. Forever. NEW BROS Harness the calculating intelligence and acid-spitting allure of Seth Brondle, wield Xebro’s flying Chakram, serenade (and grenade) terrorism with the flamenco firebrand Desperabro, or become the thing monsters have nightmares about, a stake throwing, unholy purging, self-resurrecting teenage Slayer!
 
 If sniping is more your style, famed bug hunter Bro Gummer brings pinpoint liberation with his trusty rifle, while Demolition Bro’s Freeze Grenades put evildoers right back where they belong… ON ICE. NEW BADDIES A Bro only becomes a force when confronted with those who seek to destroy their freedoms, and in Broforce Forever, the terrorists are even more determined to delete democracy. Motorbike Maniacs will try to run you down, while machine gun placements, barbed wire, sandbags and bazooka-laden blimps conspire to make each visit to occupied territory a very, very bad day at the broffice. NEW CHALLENGES Bros in search of even bigger battles can flex their muscles in new challenge levels known as Muscle Temples. Each campaign tasks Indiana Brones with navigating a perilous temple that features a new Threat Level and specific enemy types and hazards. Succeed and unlock one of four new flexes that can be deployed by any Bro, any time, any place. Just like freedom.
 
  About the Game When evil threatens the world, the world calls on Broforce - an under-funded, over-powered paramilitary organization dealing exclusively in excessive force. Brace your loins with up to four players to run ‘n’ gun as dozens of different bros and eliminate the opposing terrorist forces that threaten our way of life. Unleash scores of unique weapons and set off incredible chain reactions of fire, napalm, and limbs in the name of freedom.
 
     The Broforce Deliver your own brand of shock and awe with dozens of bros each with their own unique weaponry and special attacks designed to dispatch freedom across the world. Bro-Op & Deathmatch Battle terrorism with up to four players in cooperative mode or sever ties with your bros and face each other in several bombastic competitive modes. Explosion Run Join up with other bros to tackle these unique time attack levels under the pressure of exploding terrains and mass chaos. Fully Destructible Everything Destructible terrain opens up a slew of strategic options while the abundance of Exploding Red Barrels of Justice™ can literally level the playing field with one shot. Level Editor Design your own playground of destruction with a robust level editor and become the envy of all the other bros by sharing them online. Browse through scores of custom user created levels and complete them to rate their Bro-ness.

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 Broforce Forever, la esperada actualización gratuita del juego más patriota de 2015, fue ocultada por un delito que no había cometido. No tardó en fugarse de la prisión en la que se encontraba recluida para soltarle un megatón de libertad en toda la cara a las fuerzas del mal.
 
 La actualización final ofrece una campaña ampliada y mejorada con nuevo contenido que desbloquear, además de seis nuevos bros ultrapatrióticos, cuatro nuevos niveles de desafío en los que esparcir la democracia y la máxima expresión del poderío militar: ¡correcciones de errores!
 
 Para un jugador veterano, la mejor forma de disfrutar de todo esto es volver a jugar toda la campaña otra vez. Y otra. Y así eternamente. NUEVOS BROS Aprovecha la calculadora inteligencia y la seductora capacidad de escupir ácido de Seth Brondle, lanza el chakram volador de Xebro, cántales a los terroristas mientras los masacras con el mariachi asesino Desperabro o conviértete en la peor pesadilla de los monstruos, ¡una cazadora lanzaestacas adolescente que purga a los impíos y se autorresucita!
 
 Si lo tuyo es el largo alcance, el famoso cazador de bichos Burt Brommer imparte libertad con precisión gracias a su fiel fusil, mientras que las granadas congeladoras de Demolition Bro dejarán a los malos como se merecen... HELADOS. NUEVOS MALOS Un bro solo es digno de ese título cuando se enfrenta a quienes pretenden destruir la libertad, y en Broforce Forever los terroristas están más decididos que nunca a acabar con la democracia. Maniacos motorizados intentarán atropellarte, mientras que los puestos de ametralladoras, el alambre de espino, los sacos de arena y los dirigibles repletos de bazucas harán que cada excursión por territorio ocupado sea peor que un arma que se queda sin munición. NUEVOS DESAFÍOS Los bros que busquen batallas aún más grandes pueden exhibir sus músculos en los nuevos niveles de desafío conocidos como Templos del músculo. En cada campaña, Indiana Brones deberá atravesar un peligroso templo que cuenta con un nuevo nivel de amenaza y tipos específicos de enemigos y peligros. Si tienes éxito, desbloquearás una de las cuatro nuevas flexiones de músculos, que todos los bros podrán usar en cualquier momento y lugar en nombre de la libertad.
 
  Acerca del juego Cuando el mal amenaza al mundo, el mundo llama a Broforce, una organización paramilitar tan musculada como mal financiada que se especializa en el uso excesivo de la fuerza. Reparte libertad con hasta cuatro jugadores mientras corres y disparas con decenas de bros diferentes y elimina a los terroristas que ponen en peligro nuestra forma de vida. Emplea montones de armas únicas y provoca increíbles reacciones en cadena repletas de fuego, napalm y extremidades en nombre de la libertad. Broforce Arrasa con todo a tu manera con decenas de bros, cada uno con armas y ataques especiales únicos, diseñados para repartir libertad por todo el mundo. Modo Bro-Op (Broperativo) y Combate a muerte Enfréntate al terrorismo con hasta tres jugadores más en el modo cooperativo o corta lazos con tus bros y enfréntate a ellos en uno de los numerosos y bombásticos modos competitivos. Explosion Run (Carrera explosiva) Únete a otros bros para superar estos caóticos niveles contrarreloj mientras el terreno explota. Fully Destructible Everything (Entorno totalmente destruible) El terreno destruible ofrece un sinfín de posibilidades estratégicas, mientras que la abundancia de Exploding Red Barrels of Justice™ (Barriles rojos explosivos de la justicia™) puede cambiar el panorama con solamente un disparo. Editor de niveles Diseña tu propio campo de juegos de destrucción con un potente editor de niveles y compártelo online para ser la envidia de todos los demás bros. Descubre, completa y puntúa incontables niveles creados por usuarios.

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 Broforce Forever, la mise à jour gratuite tant attendue du jeu le plus patriotique de 2015, refusée aux gamers épris de liberté pour un crime qu'elle n'a pas commis, s'est échappée d'une prison de haute sécurité pour expédier une mégatonne de carnage dans la tronche du mal.
 
 Cette ultime mise à jour propose une campagne améliorée et élargie avec du nouveau contenu à débloquer, six Bros ultra-patriotiques, quatre niveaux de défi pour répandre la démocratie, et le summum de la puissance militaire : des corrections de bugs !
 
 La meilleure façon d'en profiter pour les joueurs de la première heure est de rejouer au mode campagne, et d'y rejouer encore et encore, pour toujours et à jamais. DE NOUVEAUX BROS Mettez à profit l'esprit calculateur et la personnalité acide de Seth Brondle, maniez le chakram volant de Xebro, jouez la sérénade (et de la grenade) contre le terrorisme avec les mariachis du provocateur Desperabro, ou devenez le pire cauchemar de tous les monstres : une ado qui chasse les impies en lançant des pieux et revient à la vie toute seule comme une grande !
 
 Si vous êtes plutôt tireur d'élite, le célèbre chasseur d'insectes Burt Brommer et son fidèle fusil apportent la liberté avec une précision chirurgicale, tandis que Demolition Bro jette un froid chez les malfaiteurs avec ses Freeze Grenades (grenades givrantes). DE NOUVEAUX MÉCHANTS L'étendue du talent d'un Bro se mesure lorsqu'il est confronté à ceux qui cherchent à bafouer ses libertés, et dans Broforce Forever, les terroristes sont plus déterminés que jamais à anéantir la démocratie. Les Motorbike Maniacs (Fous du guidon) tenteront de vous écraser, tandis que les mitrailleuses, les barbelés, les sacs de sable et les dirigeables chargés de bazooka transformeront chaque excursion en territoire ennemi en une journée très, très chargée au buBro. DE NOUVEAUX DÉFIS Les Bros qui veulent toujours plus de bagarre peuvent montrer leurs biscotos dans les Muscle Temples (Temples du muscle), des défis où Indiana Brones doit braver de nouveaux degrés de menace, des ennemis et des dangers uniques. Si vous survivez, vous débloquerez l'une des quatre nouvelles frimes utilisables par n'importe quel Bro, n'importe où et n'importe quand. Comme la liberté !
 
  À propos du jeu Quand l'ombre du mal plane sur le monde, les nations se tournent vers la Broforce, une organisation paramilitaire sous-financée et surarmée qui ne jure que par l'usage excessif de la force. Mettez-vous sur le pied de guerre avec jusqu'à quatre joueurs, choisissez parmi des dizaines de Bros différents et canardez les forces terroristes qui menacent notre mode de vie. Déchaînez une multitude d'armes et faites pleuvoir le feu, le napalm et les membres dans des réactions en chaîne délirantes au nom de la liberté. La Broforce Semez le chaos et la terreur à votre sauce avec des dizaines de Bros, chacun doté d'un armement unique et d'attaques spéciales conçues pour répandre la liberté à travers le globe. Bro-Op et Deathmatch (match à mort) Combattez le terrorisme avec jusqu'à quatre joueurs en mode coopératif ou coupez les ponts avec vos potes dans plusieurs modes compétitifs déjantés. Explosion Run (course explosive) Rejoignez d'autres Bros dans ces niveaux uniques de course contre la montre et frayez-vous un chemin à travers des terrains absolument chaotiques. Destruction à volonté Les niveaux destructibles offrent une grande variété de stratégies, et les Barils rouges explosifs de la Justice™ en abondance vous permettent de raser le champ de bataille en un seul tir. Éditeur de niveaux Créez vos propres terrains de jeu explosifs grâce à un éditeur de niveaux performant et partagez-les en ligne pour rendre vos potes verts de jalousie. Parcourez des galeries entières de niveaux créés par d'autres joueurs et terminez-les pour évaluer leur degré de "Bro-titude".

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 Broforce Forever, das langersehnte Update für das patriotischste Videospiel des Jahres 2015, wurde freiheitsliebenden Spielern wegen eines nicht begangenen Verbrechens vorenthalten, entkam dem Hochsicherheitsknast und lässt nun ein Megagemetzel nach Kentucky-Art auf das Böse los.
 
 Dieses abschließende Update bietet eine verbesserte und erweiterte Kampagne mit neuen Freischaltungen, sowie sechs neue ultra-patriotische Bros, vier neue Herausforderungslevel zum Verbreiten der Demokratie und die ultimative Bekundung militärischer Macht: Fehlerbehebungen!
 
 Wer das Spiel schon kennt, kann all das durch erneutes Spielen der gesamten Kampagne am besten genießen. Und wieder und wieder. Für immer. NEUE BROS Nutze die berechnende Intelligenz und das Säurespeien von Seth Brondle, führe Xebros fliegendes Chakram, bring dem Terrorismus mit dem Mariachi-Hitzkopf Desperabro ein (explosives) Ständchen oder werde zum Albtraum aller Monster: eine Pflöcke schleudernde, Dämonen bekämpfende, sich selbst wiederbelebende, jugendliche Jägerin!
 
 Wenn präzise Schüsse eher dein Stil sind, kann der berühmte Insektenjäger Burt Brommer mit seinem zuverlässigen Gewehr punktgenaue Befreiung bringen, während Demolition Bros Freeze Grenades (Frostgranaten) Bösewichte AUF EIS legen, wie es sich gehört. NEUE SCHURKEN Ein Bro ist erst dann in seinem Element, wenn er gegen die antritt, die seine Freiheit vernichten wollen, und in Broforce Forever arbeiten die Terroristen noch entschlossener an der Auslöschung der Demokratie. Motorbike Maniacs (Motorradfanatiker) versuchen dich zu überfahren und machen jeden Besuch in besetztem Gebiet zusammen mit MG-Nestern, Stacheldraht, Sandsäcken und Luftschiffen voller Panzerfäuste zu einem sehr, sehr harten Weg, dir deine Bro-tchen zu verdienen. NEUE HERAUSFORDERUNGEN Bros, die noch größere Schlachten suchen, können sich in neuen Herausforderungsleveln beweisen: den Muscle Temples (Muskeltempeln). In jeder Kampagne muss Indiana Brones einen gefährlichen Tempel durchqueren, der ein neues Bedrohungsmeter sowie bestimmte Gegnertypen und Risiken bietet. Schaffe das, und du schaltest eines von vier neuen Muskelspielen frei, das jeder Bro dann jederzeit und überall einsetzen kann. Genau wie die Freiheit.
 
  Infos zum Spiel Wenn wieder einmal das Böse die Welt bedroht, muss die Broforce die Kastanien aus dem Feuer holen – eine unterfinanzierte, übermächtige paramilitärische Organisation, spezialisiert auf exzessive Gewaltanwendung. Ziehe mit bis zu drei Kumpels in die Schlacht und eliminiere in der Rolle dutzender „Bros“ die Terroristen, die unsere Lebensweise bedrohen. Setze eine Vielzahl einzigartiger Waffen ein und löse im Namen des Friedens unglaubliche Kettenreaktionen aus Feuer, Napalm und abgetrennten Gliedmaßen aus. Die Broforce Setze deine eigene Art von Schocktaktik ein und wähle aus dutzenden von Bros, wobei jeder mit eigenen Waffen und Spezialangriffen ausgestattet ist, die zum Verbreiten der Freiheit in der Welt entwickelt wurden. Bro-Op & Deathmatch Bekämpfe den Terrorismus in einem Koop-Team von bis zu vier Spielern oder wende dich gegen deine Bros und tritt in mehreren bombastischen Wettkampfmodi gegen sie an. Explosion Run (Explosionslauf) Tu dich mit anderen Bros zusammen und bewältige diese speziellen Level im Wettlauf gegen die Zeit, während das Gelände explodiert und alles im Chaos versinkt. Alles komplett zerstörbar Das zerstörbare Gelände eröffnet eine Fülle strategischer Optionen und dank der zahlreichen Exploding Red Barrels of Justice™ (roten Explosivfässer der Gerechtigkeit™) kannst du das Spielfeld buchstäblich mit einem Schuss dem Erdboden gleichmachen. Level-Editor Gestalte mit dem robusten Level-Editor dein eigenes Spielfeld der Zerstörung und sichere dir den Neid der anderen Bros, indem du deine Kreationen online teilst. Durchstöbere zahllose von Nutzern erstellte Level und schließe sie ab, um ihre Bro-ness zu bewerten.

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 Broforce Forever, a tão esperada atualização grátis do jogo mais patriota de 2015, afastada dos amantes da liberdade por um crime que não cometeu, escapou de uma prisão de segurança máxima e vai soltar carnificina em doses industriais sobre toda e qualquer ameaça.
 
 A última atualização oferece uma campanha melhorada e expandida com novos itens a desbloquear, bem como seis novos Bros mega patriotas, quatro novos níveis de desafio por onde espalhar a democracia e a derradeira demonstração de poder militar: correções de erros!
 
 A melhor maneira de te divertires ao voltar ao jogo é espalhar brasas através da campanha toda. Uma e outra vez. Para sempre. NOVOS BROS Tira partido da inteligência calculista e do encanto cuspidor de ácido de Seth Brondle, empunha o Chakram voador da Xebro, faz uma serenata (explosiva) ao terrorismo com o mariachi Desperabro ou torna-te aquilo que os próprios monstros temem: uma Caçadora adolescente que lança estacas, faz purgas profanas e consegue ressuscitar!
 
 Se o teu estilo é mais o de atirador furtivo, o famoso caçador de insetos Burt Brommer conquista liberdade com a precisão da sua fiel carabina, enquanto as granadas congelantes do Demolition Bro devolvem os malfeitores a onde pertencem… AO GELO. NOVOS VILÕES Um Bro só usa a força quando é confrontado pela destruição da sua liberdade. E em Broforce Forever, os terroristas estão ainda mais determinados a eliminar a democracia. Os Motorbike Maniacs vão tentar atropelar-te e aplicar metralhadoras fixas, arame farpado, sacos de areia e dirigíveis carregados de bazucas, para tornar um autêntico martírio cada visita que fizeres ao território ocupado. NOVOS DESAFIOS Os Bros que procurem batalhas ainda mais imponentes podem mostrar os músculos em novos níveis de desafio conhecidos como Muscle Temples (Templos dos Músculos). Em cada campanha, o Indiana Brones terá de explorar um templo perigoso com um novo nível de ameaça, bem como inimigos de tipos e riscos específicos. Triunfa e desbloqueia uma de quatro novas poses que podem ser aplicadas por qualquer Bro, em qualquer altura, em qualquer lugar. Tal como a liberdade.
 
  Acerca do jogo Quando forças maléficas ameaçam o mundo, é chamada a Broforce, uma organização paramilitar com poucos recursos, mas com poder de sobra e que só trabalha na base da força bruta. Cerra os dentes e prepara-te para tiroteios explosivos com até quatro jogadores e dezenas de Bros diferentes. Elimina as forças terroristas que ameaçam o nosso modo de vida! Usa carradas de armas únicas e detona reações em cadeia de fogo, napalm e pedaços de inimigos… em nome da liberdade! A Broforce Causa choque e pavor à tua maneira com dezenas de Bros, cada um com o seu armamento e ataques especiais. Distribui resmas de liberdade pelo mundo fora. Bro-Op e Deathmatch (Todos contra todos) Combate o terrorismo com até quatro jogadores no modo cooperativo ou corta laços com os teus Bros e enfrentem-se em vários modos competitivos absolutamente bombásticos. Explosion Run (Fuga explosiva) Junta-te a outros Bros para enfrentar estes níveis contrarrelógio únicos sob a pressão de terrenos que explodem e um caos descomunal. Destrói tudo O terreno destrutível permite todo um leque de opções estratégicas, ao passo que a abundância de Exploding Red Barrels of Justice™ (Barris Vermelhos Explosivos da Justiça™) pode literalmente nivelar o terreno com um único tiro. Editor de níveis Desenha o teu recreio de destruição com um robusto editor de níveis e faz inveja aos outros Bros ao partilhá-lo online. Também podes explorar os níveis criados por outros utilizadores e completá-los para avaliar se são mesmo dignos de um Bro.

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 『Broforce Forever』は、2015年に最も愛国心のあるゲームに向けた待望の無料大型アップデートだ！ 無実の罪で自由を愛するゲーマーから奪われていた本アップデートが、最高セキュリティーの収容所から今まさに脱出し、悪の組織にメガトン級の大虐殺を食らわせようとしている。
 
 この最終アップデートでは、6人の新たなアニキたちや、民主主義を広める4種類のチャレンジステージ、そして究極の軍事的表現であろうバグ修正が含まれ、改善と拡張がほどこされたキャンペーンを楽しむことができる！
 
 かつてのプレイヤーたちが『Broforce Forever』を楽しむための最善の方法は、もう一度全キャンペーンを遊びなおすことだ。さらに、もう一度。そして、永遠に…。 新たなアニキたち Seth Brondleの狡猾な知性と酸を撒き散らすような魅力を利用したり、Xebroの宙を舞うチャクラムを操ったり、フラメンコの火付け役Desperabroと共にセレナーデ（＆グレネード）のテロを引き起こしたり…もしくは、自己再生するティーンエイシャーのSlayerになり、怪物たちが杭によって浄化される悪夢を見てしまうような存在となろう！
 
 もしスナイピングのほうが好みに合うのなら、有名な虫ハンターBro Gummerが信頼するライフルを手に極めて正確な自由をもたらし、Demolition Broの凍結グレネードが悪の軍勢を氷の中へと再度封じ込めてくれる。 新たな宿敵 アニキは自由を破壊しようと企む者たちと対峙することで初めて力を発揮するが、『Broforce Forever』では、テロリストたちが民主主義を破壊する決意をより一層強固なものにしている。Motorbike Maniacsはアニキたちを追跡しながら、機関銃、有刺鉄線、土のうの設置やバズーカを積んだ飛行船を呼び込もうとし、アニキたちにとって最悪の一日を占領地で毎度お見舞いしてくるだろう。 新たなチャレンジ Muscle Templesとして知られる新しいチャレンジステージでは、さらに大規模な戦いを求めるアニキたちの筋肉を鍛え上げることができる。各キャンペーンでIndiana Bronesに課せられるのは、新たな危険度、特殊な敵タイプ、危険物が登場する寺院のナビゲートだ。見事に成功すれば、すべてのアニキがいつでもどこでも使用できる4種類のうち1種類の新たな力がアンロックされる。そう、まるで自由そのもののようにだ。
 
  ゲームについて 世界に悪がはびこるとき、彼らが立ちあがる。金はなくとも超火力、やるときはやる（やりすぎる）準軍事組織、その名もブロフォース！ 最大4人でのプレイが可能。問答無用で銃を撃ちまくりながら、ステージを駆け抜けろ。操作可能なアニキは数十人におよぶ。ユニークな武器も多数登場。爆発に次ぐ爆発、連鎖するナパーム、四散する肉体。平和を脅かすテロリストを相手に、自由の名の下に好き放題やれ。 The Broforce 世界中に自由をもたらすために作られたユニークな武器と特殊攻撃を備えた数十人のアニキたちと共に、衝撃と畏怖たる我々の名を世に轟かせよう。 協力＆デスマッチ 最大4人のプレイヤーと協力モードでテロリストに対抗したり、アニキたちの絆を断ち切り、激しい対戦モードで対決したりしよう。 爆発だらけのラン 他のアニキたちと合流し、爆発する地形と大規模なカオスが待ち構えるユニークなタイムアタックステージに挑戦しよう。 破壊できぬ物はなし 破壊可能な地形が多くの戦略を生み出す中で、大量の「正義の爆発性赤バレル™」は一撃で戦場を更地へと変える。 ステージ・エディット 屈強なステージ・エディットを使ってデザインした自身の戦場をオンラインで共有して、世界中のアニキたちの羨望の的となろう。プレイヤーが作り出したステージをチェックしてクリアしたら、彼らのアニキ度合いを評価してあげよう。

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 Broforce Forever, the long-awaited free update to 2015’s most patriotic video game, held back from freedom-loving gamers for a crime it didn’t commit, has promptly escaped from a maximum security stockade and unleashes a megaton of Kentucky-fried carnage into the face of evil.
 
 The final update offers an improved and expanded campaign with new unlocks, along with six new ultra-patriotic bros, four new democracy-spreading challenge levels, and the ultimate expression of military might – bug fixes!
 
 The best way for a returning player to enjoy this is to play through the entire campaign again. And again. Forever. NEW BROS Harness the calculating intelligence and acid-spitting allure of Seth Brondle, wield Xebro’s flying Chakram, serenade (and grenade) terrorism with the flamenco firebrand Desperabro, or become the thing monsters have nightmares about, a stake throwing, unholy purging, self-resurrecting teenage Slayer!
 
 If sniping is more your style, famed bug hunter Bro Gummer brings pinpoint liberation with his trusty rifle, while Demolition Bro’s Freeze Grenades put evildoers right back where they belong… ON ICE. NEW BADDIES A Bro only becomes a force when confronted with those who seek to destroy their freedoms, and in Broforce Forever, the terrorists are even more determined to delete democracy. Motorbike Maniacs will try to run you down, while machine gun placements, barbed wire, sandbags and bazooka-laden blimps conspire to make each visit to occupied territory a very, very bad day at the broffice. NEW CHALLENGES Bros in search of even bigger battles can flex their muscles in new challenge levels known as Muscle Temples. Each campaign tasks Indiana Brones with navigating a perilous temple that features a new Threat Level and specific enemy types and hazards. Succeed and unlock one of four new flexes that can be deployed by any Bro, any time, any place. Just like freedom.
 
  About the Game When evil threatens the world, the world calls on Broforce - an under-funded, over-powered paramilitary organization dealing exclusively in excessive force. Brace your loins with up to four players to run ‘n’ gun as dozens of different bros and eliminate the opposing terrorist forces that threaten our way of life. Unleash scores of unique weapons and set off incredible chain reactions of fire, napalm, and limbs in the name of freedom.
 
     The Broforce Deliver your own brand of shock and awe with dozens of bros each with their own unique weaponry and special attacks designed to dispatch freedom across the world. Bro-Op & Deathmatch Battle terrorism with up to four players in cooperative mode or sever ties with your bros and face each other in several bombastic competitive modes. Explosion Run Join up with other bros to tackle these unique time attack levels under the pressure of exploding terrains and mass chaos. Fully Destructible Everything Destructible terrain opens up a slew of strategic options while the abundance of Exploding Red Barrels of Justice™ can literally level the playing field with one shot. Level Editor Design your own playground of destruction with a robust level editor and become the envy of all the other bros by sharing them online. Browse through scores of custom user created levels and complete them to rate their Bro-ness.

ゲーム
当邪恶威胁世界时,世界就会呼唤 Broforce,-一个资金不足但能力过硬、专门处理极端组织的准军事组织。 挺直腰板,与其他几十个兄弟一样奔跑、开火,消灭威胁到我们生活方式的恐怖主义。 释放数十种独特的武器,以自由之名掀起一系列对于火、烧夷弹、肢体等不可思议的连锁反应。

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 Broforce Forever er den længeventede, gratis opdatering til det mest patriotiske spil i 2015. Frihedselskende gamere har hungret efter den, og nu har den endelig undsluppet sit triste fangenskab og er klar til at besejre ondskaben med et brag af en anden verden.
 
 Den seneste opdatering giver dig forbedrede og udvidede kampagner med nye oplåselige genstande samt seks nye ultra-patriotiske bros, fire nye demokratispredende udfordringsbaner og den ultimative militærmagtdemonstration: Fejlrettelser!
 
 Tilbagevendende spillere får mest nydelse ud af at spille hele kampagnen igen. Og igen. For evigt. NYE BROS Behersk Seth Brondles nøjeregnende intelligens og syrespyttende tiltrækningskraft, kæmp med Xebros flyvende chakram, få terroristerne til at ryste i bukserne med Desperabros knivskarpe skønsang, eller bliv den, som monstrene har mareridt om: Den pælkastende, dæmonfordrivende og selvvækkende teenager, Slayer!
 
 Hvis du er mere til snigmord, kan du træde ind i rollen som den berømte Burt Brommer, der uddeler frihed med knivskarpe skud, mens Demolition Bros Freeze Grenades (Isgranater) sætter ondskaben på køl. NYE SKURKE En sand bro bruger kun sine kræfter, når han står over for dem, der ønsker at ødelægge friheden, og i Broforce Forever er terroristerne endnu mere stålsatte på at smadre demokratiet. Motorbike Maniacs vil forsøge at køre dig over, mens luftskibe med maskinpistoler, pigtråd, sandsække og bazookaer forsøger med al magt at sende dig på brospitalet. NYE UDFORDRINGER Bros, der er på udkig efter endnu større kampe, kan flekse deres muskler i nye udfordringsbaner, også kendt som Muscle Temples (Muskeltempler). Hver kampagne udfordrer Indiana Brones til at kæmpe sig gennem et farligt tempel, hvor indeholder et nyt trusselsniveau og specifikke fjendetyper og farer. Hvis du gennemfører, kan du låse op for en af fire nye flekser, der kan bruges af enhver bro, når om helst, hvor som helst. Ligesom frihed.
 
  Om spillet Da ondskaben truer verden, hidkaldes Broforce – en underfinansieret og overbevæbnet paramilitær organisation, der udelukkende gør brug af overdrevet vold. Gør dig klar til at kaste dig ud i kamp med op til fire spillere, hvor I i rollerne som forskellige bros, skal smadre jer gennem fjendtlige terroriststyrker, der truer jeres livsførelse. Fyr den af med masser af forskellige våben, og sæt gang i utrolige kædereaktioner af ild, napalm og lemmer i frihedens navn. The Broforce Chokér og imponér i rollen som masser af forskellige bros, som hver har sit egent unikke våbenarsenal og specialangreb, der er designet til at sprede frihed verden over. Bro-Op & Deathmatch (Samarbejde & dødskamp) Bekæmp terrorisme sammen med op til fire spillere i samarbejdsspil, eller slå hånden af dine bros, og kæmp mod hinanden i flere bombastiske konkurrencespiltyper. Explosion Run (Eksplosionsbane) Slut dig til andre bros for at tackle unikke angrebsbaner på tid, mens bomber og kaos suser jer om ørerne. Fully Destructible Everything (Alt kan smadres) Smadrevenligt terræn giver dig en masse forskellige strategiske muligheder, mens et overflødighedshorn af Exploding Red Barrels of Justice™ (Eksplosive røde retfærdighedstønder™) helt bogstaveligt kan jævne en bane med jorden med et brag. Level Editor (Baneværktøj) Design din egen destruktive legeplads med et solidt baneværktøj, og mærk dine bros misundelse, når du deler dem online. Gennemse massevis af brugerdefinerede baner, og kæmp i dem for at give dem din bro-vurdering.

BROFORCE FOREVER     
 Broforce Forever, l'attesissimo aggiornamento gratuito del videogioco più patriottico del 2015, tenuto nascosto ai giocatori amanti della libertà per un crimine mai commesso, è fuggito da una prigione militare di massima sicurezza e ha scatenato un megatone di carneficine contro il male.
 
 L'ultimo aggiornamento offre una campagna migliorata e ampliata con nuovi elementi sbloccabili, sei nuovi Bro super patriottici, quattro nuovi livelli di sfida che diffondono democrazia e la massima espressione della potenza militare: le correzioni di bug!
 
 Per i giocatori storici, il modo migliore di goderselo è quello di rigiocare l'intera campagna. Più volte. Per sempre. NUOVI BRO Sfrutta l'intelligenza calcolatrice e il fascino sputa-acido di Seth Brondle, brandisci il Chakram volante di Xebro, fai una serenata (e lancia una granata) al terrorismo con il mariachi testa calda Desperabro o diventa l'incubo dei mostri: una cacciatrice adolescente che lancia paletti, epura la malvagità e si rianima da sola!
 
 Se il cecchinaggio fa per te, il famoso cacciatore Burt Brommer porterà la libertà con il suo fucile, mentre le Freeze Grenades (Granate congelanti) di Demolition Bro faranno restare i nemici... DI GHIACCIO. NUOVI NEMICI Un Bro diventa forte quando si confronta con chi vuole minare le sue libertà, e in Broforce Forever i terroristi sono ancora più determinati a eliminare la democrazia. I Motorbike Maniacs (Motomaniaci) cercheranno di investirti, e mitragliatrici, filo spinato, sacchi di sabbia e dirigibili carichi di bazooka renderanno ogni visita al territorio occupato un'impresa ardua che metterà a dura prova la pazienza dei Bro. NUOVE SFIDE I Bro in cerca di battaglie ancora maggiori possono mostrare i muscoli nei nuovi livelli di sfida conosciuti come Muscle Temples (Templi muscolari). Ogni campagna richiede che Indiana Brones attraversi un tempio pericoloso che presenta un nuovo livello minaccia e tipi di nemici e pericoli specifici. Supera l'impresa e sblocca una delle quattro nuove pose per mostrare i muscoli utilizzabili da qualsiasi Bro, quando e dove vuoi. Come la libertà.
 
  Informazioni sul gioco Quando il male minaccia il mondo, il mondo chiama in aiuto Broforce, un'organizzazione paramilitare potente ma sottofinanziata che agisce con violenza eccessiva. Insieme a un massimo di quattro giocatori, corri e spara nei panni di Bro diversi ed elimina le forze terroriste nemiche che minacciano la nostra vita. Manda a segno attacchi con armi uniche e innesca reazioni a catena a suon di spari, napalm e violenza in nome della libertà. Broforce Sfodera il tuo stile di colpi e sbalordisci tutti con decine di Bro, ognuno con armi e attacchi speciali personali ideati per riportare la libertà nel mondo. Bro-Op e Deathmatch (Modalità Brooperativa e Deathmatch) Combatti il terrorismo insieme a un massimo di quattro giocatori in modalità cooperativa o separati dai tuoi Bro affrontandoli in tante eccezionali modalità competitive. Explosion Run (Corsa esplosiva) Unisciti ai Bro e affronta livelli a tempo unici su terreni esplosivi e caos assoluto. Fully Destructible Everything (Distruttibilità totale) L'ambiente distruttibile offre infinite opzioni strategiche, e usando Exploding Red Barrels of Justice™ (Barili esplosivi rossi della Giustizia™) è possibile radere al suolo ogni cosa in un solo colpo. Editor livelli Crea la tua area personale di distruzione con un fantastico editor livelli e suscita l'invidia di tutti gli altri Bro tramite la condivisione online. Sfoglia decine di livelli personalizzati creati dagli utenti e completali per valutare il loro cameratismo.

game.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
game.description:
Red Dead Redemption 2 is the epic tale of outlaw Arthur Morgan and the infamous Van der Linde gang, on the run across America at the dawn of the modern age.

America, 1899. The end of the wild west era has begun as lawmen hunt down the last remaining outlaw gangs. Those who will not surrender or succumb are killed.

After a robbery goes badly wrong in the western town of Blackwater, Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang are forced to flee. With federal agents and the best bounty hunters in the nation massing on their heels, the gang must rob, steal and fight their way across the rugged heartland of America in order to survive. As deepening internal divisions threaten to tear the gang apart, Arthur must make a choice between his own ideals and loyalty to the gang who raised him.

localized_title.text: 荒野大镖客：救赎2 Red Dead Redemption 2

localized_description.text:
Red Dead Redemption 2 is the epic tale of outlaw Arthur Morgan and the infamous Van der Linde gang, on the run across America at the dawn of the modern age.

America, 1899. The end of the wild west era has begun as lawmen hunt down the last remaining outlaw gangs. Those who will not surrender or succumb are killed.

After a robbery goes badly wrong in the western town of Blackwater, Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang are forced to flee. With federal agents and the best bounty hunters in the nation massing on their heels, the gang must rob, steal and fight their way across the rugged heartland of America in order to survive. As deepening internal divisions threaten to tear the gang apart, Arthur must make a choice between his own ideals and loyalty to the gang who raised him.

美国，1899 年。当警察开始打击残余亡命之徒的帮派时，蛮荒的西部时代迎来了最后的黄昏。不愿投降或是屈服的人，只有死路一条。

亚瑟·摩根和范德林德帮众在黑水镇的一次抢劫行动遭遇了始料不及的意外，他们不得不逃离这个西部小镇。联邦侦探和全国顶尖的赏金猎人在他们的身后穷追不舍，亚瑟一行人必须在广袤蛮荒的美国腹地上四处劫掠、挣扎求生。而帮派内部的矛盾分化日渐加深，摆在亚瑟面前的将是他无法避免的抉择：究竟是选择自己的理想，还是选择效忠于抚养了自己的帮派。

Red Dead Redemption 2 由 Grand Theft Auto V 和 Red Dead Redemption 的原班人马精心打造，在文明初开的时代背景下，谱写了美国腹地上的一部快意恩仇史。即将于 2018 年 10 月 26 日登陆 PlayStation 4 和 Xbox One 平台，敬请期待。

game.title: Divinity: Original Sin II
game.description:
Divinity: Original Sin II is a single- and multiplayer top-down, party-based role-playing game with pen & paper RPG-like levels of freedom. It features turn-based combat, a strong focus on systematic gameplay and a well-grounded narrative.

The Divine is dead. The Void approaches. And the powers lying dormant within you are soon to awaken. The battle for Divinity has begun. Choose wisely and trust sparingly; darkness lurks within every heart.

game.title: God of War
game.description:
God of War is the sequel to God of War III as well as a continuation of the canon God of War chronology. Unlike previous installments, this game focuses on Norse mythology and follows an older and more seasoned Kratos and his son Atreus in the years since the third game. It is in this harsh, unforgiving world that he must fight to survive… and teach his son to do the same.

Many years have passed since Kratos, Spartan warrior and former Greek God of War, took his vengeance against the Greek Gods, and he now lives with his young son Atreus in ancient Norway in the realm of Midgard. The game begins after the death of the Jötunn warrior Faye, Kratos' second wife and Atreus' mother, whose last request was for her ashes to be spread at the highest speak of the nine realms. Kratos and Atreus prepare a funeral pyre for her, mourn her death and soon go on a hunt as per Kratos' desire. However much to Kratos' disappointment, Atreus proves his incompetence and lack of focus, making Kratos reconsider taking Atreus in his journey. Kratos is soon attacked by a mysterious stranger with godlike powers, and who cannot feel anything physically. After seemingly killing him, Kratos reluctantly takes Atreus with him and begins their journey.

game.title: Before Your Eyes
game.description:
A first person narrative adventure which tells the story of a soul’s journey into the afterlife using your real-life blinks.

The story begins after your death, aboard the ship of a mythical Ferryman tasked with shepherding souls to the afterlife. In order to help you pass on, he must first learn the story of your life. And so, he sends you back to relive your most important moments.

game.title: A Plague Tale: Requiem
game.description:
A Plague Tale: Requiem is an action-adventure game similar to its predecessor. The player assumes control of Amicia and must face against both soldiers from the French Inquisition and hordes of rats that are spreading the black plague. The gameplay is largely similar to the first game, though the combat system is significantly expanded. The game features a progression system in which the player will be awarded additional skills and abilities. Stealth players will unlock skills that allow them to sneak around more efficiently, while those who prefer a more lethal approach will unlock additional combat skills. Locations are also larger, giving players additional options to progress.

After escaping their devastated homeland, Amicia and Hugo travel far south to new regions and vibrant cities. There, they attempt to start a new life and control Hugo’s curse. But when Hugo’s powers reawaken, death and destruction return in a flood of devouring rats. Forced to flee once more, the siblings place their hopes on a prophesized island that may hold the key to saving Hugo.

But when Hugo’s powers reawaken, death and destruction return in a flood of devouring rats. Forced to flee once more, the siblings place their hopes on a prophesized island that may hold the key to saving Hugo.

game.brief:
A Plague Tale: Requiem is an action-adventure game similar to its predecessor. The player assumes control of Amicia and must face against both soldiers from the French Inquisition and hordes of rats that are spreading the black plague. The gameplay is largely similar to the first game, though the combat system is significantly expanded. The game features a progression system in which the player will be awarded additional skills and abilities. Stealth players will unlock skills that allow them to sneak around more efficiently, while those who prefer a more lethal approach will unlock additional combat skills. Locations are also larger, giving players additional options to progress.

After escaping their devastated homeland, Amicia and Hugo travel far south to new regions and vibrant cities. There, they attempt to start a new life and control Hugo’s curse. But when Hugo’s powers reawaken, death and destruction return in a flood of devouring rats. Forced to flee once more, the siblings place their hopes on a prophesized island that may hold the key to saving Hugo.

game.title: BioShock Infinite
game.description:
BioShock Infinite is the third game in the BioShock series. It is not a direct sequel/prequel to any of the previous BioShock games but takes place in an entirely different setting, although it shares similar features, gameplay and concepts with the previous games. BioShock Infinite features a range of environments that force the player to adapt, with different weapons and strategies for each situation. Interior spaces feature close combat with enemies, but unlike previous games set in Rapture, the setting of Infinite contains open spaces with emphasis on sniping and ranged combat against as many as fifteen enemies at once.

BioShock Infinite takes place in the airborne city of Columbia in 1912, where the player assumes the role of Booker DeWitt, a disgraced ex-Pinkerton agent. Booker has been given the job of finding a mysterious and powerful woman imprisoned in Columbia since birth named Elizabeth in order to wipe his debts away, and the story follows the unlikely duo as they journey to escape the flying city while discovering its twisted secrets.

localized_description.text:
BioShock Infinite is the third game in the BioShock series. It is not a direct sequel/prequel to any of the previous BioShock games but takes place in an entirely different setting, although it shares similar features, gameplay and concepts with the previous games. BioShock Infinite features a range of environments that force the player to adapt, with different weapons and strategies for each situation. Interior spaces feature close combat with enemies, but unlike previous games set in Rapture, the setting of Infinite contains open spaces with emphasis on sniping and ranged combat against as many as fifteen enemies at once.

BioShock Infinite takes place in the airborne city of Columbia in 1912, where the player assumes the role of Booker DeWitt, a disgraced ex-Pinkerton agent. Booker has been given the job of finding a mysterious and powerful woman imprisoned in Columbia since birth named Elizabeth in order to wipe his debts away, and the story follows the unlikely duo as they journey to escape the flying city while discovering its twisted secrets.

Indebted to the wrong people, with his life on the line, veteran of the U.S. Cavalry and now hired gun, Booker DeWitt has only one opportunity to wipe his slate clean. He must rescue Elizabeth, a mysterious girl imprisoned since childhood and locked up in the flying city of Columbia. Forced to trust one another, Booker and Elizabeth form a powerful bond during their daring escape. Together, they learn to harness an expanding arsenal of weapons and abilities, as they fight on zeppelins in the clouds, along high-speed Sky-Lines, and down in the streets of Columbia, all while surviving the threats of the air-city and uncovering its dark secret. Key Features   	 The City in the Sky  – Leave the depths of Rapture to soar among the clouds of Columbia. A technological marvel, the flying city is a beautiful and vibrant world that holds a very dark secret. 
   	 Unlikely Mission  – Set in 1912, hired gun Booker DeWitt must rescue a mysterious girl from the sky-city of Columbia or never leave it alive. 
   	 Whip, Zip, and Kill  – Turn the city’s Sky-Lines into weaponized roller coasters as you zip through the flying city and dish out fatal hands-on punishment.
   	 Tear Through Time  – Open Tears in time and space to shape the battlefield and turn the tide in combat by pulling weapons, turrets, and other resources out of thin air.
   	 Vigorous Powers  – Throw explosive fireballs, shoot lightning, and release murders of crows as devastatingly powerful Vigors surge through your body to be unleashed against all that oppose you. 
   	 Custom Combat Experience  – With deadly weapons in one hand, powerful Vigors in the other, and the ability to open Tears in time and space, fight your own way through the floating city of Columbia to rescue Elizabeth and reach freedom. 
   	 1999 Mode  – Upon finishing BioShock Infinite, the player can unlock a game mode called “1999 Mode” that gives experienced players a taste of the kind of design and balance that hardcore gamers enjoyed back in the 20th century.

Redevable envers les mauvaises personnes, avec sa vie en jeu, vétéran de la cavalerie américaine et désormais mercenaire, Booker DeWitt dispose d'une opportunité unique pour effacer son ardoise. Il doit secourir Elizabeth, une mystérieuse jeune femme emprisonnée depuis sa plus tendre enfance et enfermée dans la ville flottante de Columbia. Forcés de se faire mutuellement confiance, Booker et Elizabeth établiront une puissante relation durant leur audacieuse évasion. Ensemble, ils apprendront à exploiter un arsenal croissant d'armes et de capacités, lors de combats sur des zeppelins dans les nuages, à toute vitesse sur des Sky-Lines (aérofrets) et dans les rues de Columbia, tout en survivant aux menaces de la cité volante et en découvrant son sombre secret. Principales caractéristiques    La cité dans le ciel  – Quittez les profondeurs de Rapture pour monter en flèche dans les nuages de Columbia. Un labyrinthe technologique, la ville est un monde magnifique et dynamique cachant un très sombre secret.
    Mission improbable  – Se déroulant en 1912, le mercenaire Booker DeWitt doit secourir une mystérieuse jeune femme de la ville flottante ou ne jamais en sortir vivant.
    Battre, filer et tuer  – Transformez les Sky-Lines (aérofrets) de la cité en montagnes russes armées lorsque vous filez à travers la ville et distribuez des sanctions fatales.
    Traverser le temps  – Ouvrez des déchirures dans le temps et l’espace pour façonner le champ de bataille et renverser le cours du combat en sortant des armes, tourelles et autres ressources de votre chapeau.
    Pouvoirs vigoureux  – Jetez des boules de feu explosives, des éclairs et lâchez des hordes de corbeaux meurtrières grâce à de puissants Vigors dévastateurs générés par votre corps, prêt à se déchaîner contre tout ce qui vous oppose.
    Expérience de combat personnalisée  – Avec des armes mortelles dans une main, de puissants Vigors dans l'autre et la capacité d'ouvrir des déchirures dans l’espace et dans le temps, combattez à votre façon à travers la ville flottante de Columbia pour secourir Elizabeth et rejoindre la liberté.
    1999 Mode  – Après avoir terminé BioShock Infinite, le joueur peut débloquer un mode de jeu appelé "1999 Mode", donnant aux joueurs expérimentés un avant-goût du genre de conception et d'équilibre que les "hardcore gamers" appréciaient au 20ème siècle.

“把女孩带给我们，之前的债务就一笔勾销。”

时间是1912年，债台高筑的私家侦探布克·德威特只有一个机会洗刷旧账：解救伊丽莎白，一位神秘的女孩，自从童年开始便身陷天空之城哥伦比亚的囹圄之中。

布克和伊丽莎白被迫相互信任，在他们逃跑的过程中形成了强大的纽带。他们一起学习如何驾驭不断扩大的武器和能力库，在云层中和哥伦比亚街头与飞艇作战，同时从空中城市的威胁中幸存下来，揭开其黑暗秘密。

game.title: The Stanley Parable
game.description: The Stanley Parable is a first-person exploration game which ponders questions related to player agency, narrative pacing, escapism through gaming, objective-driven game design, authorial intent, and the conflict of interest between players and game creators.

localized_description.text: The Stanley Parable is a first-person exploration game which ponders questions related to player agency, narrative pacing, escapism through gaming, objective-driven game design, authorial intent, and the conflict of interest between players and game creators.

game.brief: The Stanley Parable is a first-person exploration game which ponders questions related to player agency, narrative pacing, escapism through gaming, objective-driven game design, authorial intent, and the conflict of interest between players and game creators.

game.title: This War of Mine
game.description:
In This War Of Mine you do not play as an elite soldier, rather a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle.

The pace of This War of Mine is imposed by the day and night cycle. During the day snipers outside stop you from leaving your refuge, so you need to focus on maintaining your hideout: crafting, trading and taking care of your survivors. At night, take one of your civilians on a mission to scavenge through a set of unique locations for items that will help you stay alive.

Make life-and-death decisions driven by your conscience. Try to protect everybody from your shelter or sacrifice some of them for longer-term survival. During war, there are no good or bad decisions; there is only survival. The sooner you realize that, the better.

game.title: Gears 5
game.description:
From one of gaming’s most acclaimed sagas, Gears is bigger than ever, with five thrilling modes and the deepest campaign yet. With all-out war descending, Kait Diaz breaks away to uncover her connection to the enemy and discovers the true danger to Sera – herself.

The world is crumbling. The Swarm has corrupted the Coalition’s robot army and is descending upon human cities. With danger closing in, Kait Diaz breaks away to uncover her connection to the enemy and discovers the true danger to Sera – herself.

game.title: Minds Beneath Us
game.description:
Story Embark on a thrilling sci-fi journey in a futuristic Asian city with MINDS BENEATH US. In a society fully automated by advanced AI, you find yourself trapped in a foreign body, alongside the subconscious of its original owner. 
 
 As society evolves, a new industry emerges that replaces the hardware needed to operate AI-automated systems with human brains. Consequently, the most disadvantaged citizens have had no choice but to sign up one after another. Against the backdrop of this mad society, a conspiracy gradually unfolds.
 
   Features 
   Players can make their own dialogue choices and shape the relationships between characters throughout the journey. The combination of dialogue choices and actions will continually affect the story.  
   Observe environments, pay attention to the dialogue, and then look for hidden clues in every scene. This way, you can even unlock new dialogue choices.  
    With hand-drawn animation and smooth camera movement, a unique cinematic experience is created.  
    The game combines 2D characters and detailed 3D environments to present the streets of a near-future Taipei.

游戏剧情 
 《沉没意志》讲述了主角戴士杰与寄宿在他体内的神秘意识所共同经历的一段冒险。
 
 在人工智能全面普及并取代大量工作的未来社会，一个全新的产业诞生了。通过将大量人脑相连所产生的运算网络，无数传统人工智能需要的昂贵硬件被轻易地取代了。
 也因此，无数因人工智能而失业的弱势群体全都投入了这样的工作。
 以这个病态社会为舞台，一桩阴谋逐渐显现。
 
   主要玩法 
   通过持续进行对话选择，玩家与游戏中形形色色的角色之间的关系将产生变化，并最终对剧情造成影响。
   观察环境、聆听角色所说的话，在场景中找到隐藏线索，解锁对话选项。
   手绘动画和灵活运镜，在横向视角也能打造电影的感受。
   2D混合3D的场景，并且以亚洲城市的当代风貌为基础，设计一个熟悉又陌生的近未来世界。  
 加入玩家QQ群： 679786176

背景設定 沉沒意志講述一段主角戴士傑與那能控制他身體的神祕意識所共同經歷的冒險。
 
 在人工智慧全面普及並取代大量工作的未來社會，一個全新的產業誕生了。透過將大量人腦相連所產生的運算網路，無數傳統人工智慧需要的昂貴硬體被輕易地取代了。
 也因此，無數因人工智慧而失業的弱勢人口全都投入了這樣的工作。
 以這個病態社會為舞台，一樁陰謀逐漸顯現。
 
   主要玩法 
   玩家可以透過持續進行對話選擇，讓你跟角色們的關係產生改變，並最終對劇情造成影響。  
   觀察環境、聆聽角色們說的話，在場景中找到隱藏的線索，解鎖對話的選項。     手繪動畫和靈活運鏡，在橫向視角也能打造電影的感受。      2d混合3d的場景，並且以台灣當代風貌為基礎設計一個近未來世界。

ストーリー 
 『Minds Beneath Us』は主人公「ジェイ」とその体を操っている謎の「マインズ」と共に冒険をする物語である。
 
 人工知能の普及によりほとんどの仕事が奪われた未来、大量な失業者が現れた。その反動で人間の脳を繋げて運用するネットワークが誕生し、高額な設備投資が必要な旧来型の人工知能は淘汰されてしまう。
 
 人工知能に仕事を奪われた失業者の多くがこの「人脳ネットワーク」に加わっていく……
 
 そんな病的な社会で、ある陰謀が浮上する……
 
   特徴 
   会話の選択を通してキャラクター同士の関係性を変え、ストーリーに影響を与えられる。
   環境調査、他のキャラクターとの会話やシーンで手がかりを見つけることで会話の選択肢をアンロック。
   本作品は手描きアニメーションとカメラワークを巧みに運用しており、横スクロールで映画のような体験。
   2D描画と3Dシーンで現代の台湾をテーマにデザインした近未来世界が特徴。

Minds Beneath Us is a story-rich Sci-Fi thriller adventure game set in a futuristic Asian city. In a society that has become fully automated with AI, you will be trapped into a body that doesn't belong to yourself, making choices for him and face the coming fate together.

Minds Beneath Us is an adventure about a guy and a data ghost who lived in his head and controlled his body.
After society has become fully automated with AI, a new industry has emerged that replaces the hardware needed to operate the internet with linked human brains.

As a result, the most disadvantaged of citizens have had no choice but to put in their bid to sign up, one after another.
Against the stage of this mad society, a mysterious conspiracy gradually unveils.

game.title: Fallout 3
game.description:
Fallout 3 from the creators of the award-winning Oblivion, featuring one of the most realized game worlds ever created. Create any kind of character you want and explore the open wastes of post-apocalyptic Washington D.C. Every minute is a fight for survival as you encounter Super Mutants, Ghouls, Raiders and other dangers of the Wasteland. Prepare for the future.

The third game in the Fallout series, Fallout 3 is a singleplayer action role-playing game (RPG) set in a post-apocalyptic Washington DC. Combining the horrific insanity of the Cold War era theory of mutually assured destruction gone terribly wrong, with the kitschy naivety of American 1950s nuclear propaganda, Fallout 3 will satisfy both players familiar with the popular first two games in its series as well as those coming to the franchise for the first time.

The introductory sequence introduces the player to their character's father James, a doctor and scientist in Vault 101. James frequently makes comments about the player character's deceased mother Catherine, and her favorite Bible passage, Revelation 21:6, which speaks of "the waters of life".

The main quest begins after the player is forced to flee Vault 101 when James leaves the vault, throwing it into anarchy and causing the paranoid Overseer to send his security force after the player. The search for James takes the character on a journey through the Wasteland, first to the nearby town of Megaton, named for the undetonated atomic bomb at the center of town, then the Galaxy News Radio station, whose enthusiastic DJ Three Dog gives the player the moniker of "The Lone Wanderer". The player travels to Rivet City, a derelict aircraft carrier now serving as a fortified human settlement. Here the player meets Doctor Li, a scientist who worked alongside the player's father. Doctor Li informs the player of Project Purity, a plan conceived by Catherine and James to purify all the water in the Tidal Basin and eventually the entire Potomac River with a giant water purifier built in the Jefferson Memorial. However, continued delays and Catherine's death during childbirth put an end to the project, and James took the player's character as a newborn to raise them in the safety of Vault 101.

After investigating the Jefferson Memorial, the Lone Wanderer tracks James to Vault 112, and frees him from a virtual reality program being run by the Vault's sadistic Overseer, Dr. Braun. James and the player return to Rivet City, and James reveals he sought out Braun for information on the Garden of Eden Creation Kit (G.E.C.K.), a device that contains the components needed to finally activate Project Purity. James and Doctor Li lead a team of Rivet City scientists to the memorial with intent to restart the project, but the memorial is invaded by the Enclave, a powerful military organization formed from the remnants of the pre-War United States government. James floods the project's control room with radiation to stop the Enclave military leader, Colonel Augustus Autumn, from taking control of it, killing himself (but Autumn survives), his last words urging his child to run. The Lone Wanderer and Dr. Li flee to the ruins of the Pentagon, now a base for the Brotherhood of Steel and now known as the Citadel.

With Project Purity still inoperable even with the Enclave occupying the site, the player travels to Vault 87 to find a G.E.C.K. and finish James's work. The player finds the Vault to be a testing site for the FEV (Forced Evolutionary Virus), and the source of the Super Mutants in the Capital Wasteland. After the player acquires the G.E.C.K., the Wanderer is ambushed by the Enclave and captured.

At the Enclave base at Raven Rock, the player is freed from their cell by the Enclave leader, President John Henry Eden, who requests a private audience with them. En route to his office however, Colonel Autumn defies Eden's orders and takes command of the Enclave military, ordering them to kill the player. Fighting their way to Eden's office, the player discovers Eden is actually a sentient ZAX series supercomputer who took control of the Enclave after their defeat in Fallout 2 on the West Coast thirty years ago. Eden wishes to repeat the plan of then-President Dick Richardson using Project Purity, infecting the water with a modified strain of FEV that will make it toxic to any mutated life. This plan will kill most life in the wasteland including humans, but the Enclave, due to their genetic "purity" as a result of their isolation, will be immune and free to take control of the area. The Wanderer, provided with a sample of the new F.E.V., is given a choice to either leave peacefully or convince Eden to self-destruct the entire base. The Lone Wanderer escapes Raven Rock and returns to the Citadel.

With the knowledge they possess, the G.E.C.K. and the means to activate Project Purity, the Brotherhood assault the Jefferson Memorial, spearheaded by a giant robot named Liberty Prime. In the control room of Project Purity the player confronts Colonel Autumn, and has the choice to persuade him to give up or kill him. Dr. Li informs the player that the purifier is ready to be activated, but the activation code must be input manually, and also that the control room is flooded with lethal amounts of radiation. The Lone Wanderer is forced to choose between sending Sarah Lyons of the Brotherhood inside the extremely irradiated purifier or entering themselves. Whoever enters into the chamber inputs the code hinted at through the game, that being 21:6, and dies from a radiation spike.

Vault-Tec engineers have worked around the clock on an interactive reproduction of Wasteland life for you to enjoy from the comfort of your own vault. Included is an expansive world, unique combat, shockingly realistic visuals, tons of player choice, and an incredible cast of dynamic characters.

2008 action role-playing video game
videojuego de 2008
jeu vidéo de 2008
Computerspiel aus dem Jahr 2008
jogo eletrônico de 2008

游戏背景是因核战争荒废了270年后的美国，2277年的未来世界。200年前，2077年引发的核战争导致了地面的荒废，人类在被称为“Vault” 的避难所生活、生育、死去。其中的一间地下避难所“Vault101”，就在如今“Capital Wasteland”（首都废土）华盛顿DC附近。 故事主要讲述某一天，主角的父亲，因违背了监守者的意愿，从Vault101逃离了。玩家为追赶父亲，躲过警卫的追击，离开了避难所。踏上寻找父亲的冒险旅程。

Vault-Tec engineers have worked around the clock on an interactive reproduction of Wasteland life for you to enjoy from the comfort of your own vault. Included is an expansive world, unique combat, shockingly realistic visuals, tons of player choice, and an incredible cast of dynamic characters. Every minute is a fight for survival against the terrors of the outside world — radiation, Super Mutants, and hostile mutated creatures. From Vault-Tec, America's First Choice in Post Nuclear Simulation.                    
 					   Limitless Freedom!  Take in the sights and sounds of the vast Capital Wasteland! See the great monuments of the United States lying in post-apocalyptic ruin! You make the choices that define you and change the world. Just keep an eye on your Rad Meter!                    
 					   Experience S.P.E.C.I.A.L.!  Vault-Tec engineers bring you the latest in human ability simulation — the SPECIAL Character System! Utilizing new breakthroughs in points-based ability representation, SPECIAL affords unlimited customization of your character. Also included are dozens of unique skills and perks to choose from, each with a dazzling variety of effects!                    
 					   Fantastic New Views!  The wizards at Vault-Tec have done it again! No longer constrained to just one view, experience the world from 1st or 3rd person perspective. Customize your view with the touch of a button!                     
 					   The Power of Choice!  Feeling like a dastardly villain today, or a Good Samaritan? Pick a side or walk the line, as every situation can be dealt with in many different ways. Talk out your problems in a civilized fashion, or just flash your Plasma Rifle.                     
 					   Blast 'Em Away With V.A.T.S.!  Even the odds in combat with the Vault-Tec Assisted Targeting System for your Pip-Boy Model 3000! V.A.T.S. allows you to pause time in combat, target specific body parts on your target, queue up attacks, and let Vault-Tec take out your aggression for you. Rain death and destruction in an all-new cinematic presentation.                    
 					   Mind-Blowing Artificial Intelligence!  At Vault-Tec, we realize that the key to reviving civilization after a global nuclear war is people. Our best minds pooled their efforts to produce an advanced version of Radiant AI, America's First Choice in Human Interaction Simulation. Facial expressions, gestures, unique dialog, and lifelike behavior are brought together with stunning results by the latest in Vault-Tec technology.                    
 					   Eye-Popping Prettiness!*:  Witness the harsh realities of nuclear fallout rendered like never before in modern super-deluxe HD graphics. From the barren Wasteland, to the danger-filled offices and metro tunnels of DC, to the hideous rotten flesh of a mutant's face.                           *Protective Eyewear Encouraged.

Los ingenieros de Vault-Tec han trabajado sin descanso en una reproducción interactiva de la vida en el Yermo para que la disfrutes desde la comodidad de tu refugio. Incluye un mundo en constante expansión, combates únicos, efectos visuales cargados de realismo, miles de decisiones para tomar y un increíble reparto de personajes dinámicos. Cada minuto es una lucha por sobrevivir a los horrores del mundo exterior: radiación, supermutantes y criaturas mutantes hostiles. Vault-Tec, la primera elección de América en simulación post-nuclear.   
    ¡Libertad sin límites!  ¡Explora los enormes parajes de Yermo Capital! ¡Visita los grandiosos monumentos de los Estados Unidos en las post-apocalípticas ruinas de la capital del país! Toma las decisiones que te definirán como personaje y cambia el mundo. ¡Simplemente procura no apartar la vista de tu medidor de radiación!   
    ¡Vive la experiencia S.P.E.C.I.A.L.!  Los ingenieros de Vault-Tec te brindan el último grito en simulación de habilidades humanas: ¡el Sistema de Creación de Personajes SPECIAL! Gracias a un nuevo sistema de representación basado en reparto de puntos, SPECIAL te ofrece una personalización de personaje ilimitada. También se incluyen docenas de habilidades y ventajas, ¡cada una con una variada gama de efectos!    
    ¡Nuevas y fantásticas vistas!  ¡Los magos de Vault-Tec lo han vuelto a conseguir! No volverás a estar atado a una sola vista, vive la acción desde primera o tercera persona. ¡Personaliza tu vista con sólo tocar un botón!  
    ¡El poder de la elección!  ¿Te sientes hoy como el peor de los villanos o como un buen samaritano? Elige un lado o transita la fina línea de la neutralidad, dado que cada situación puede ser solucionada de muchas y diferentes maneras. Resuelve tus problemas de forma civilizada o, simplemente, dispara tu rifle de plasma   
    ¡Volatilízalos con V.A.T.S.!  ¡Equilibra las probabilidades en combate con el Sistema de Puntería Asistido de Vault-Tec para tu Pip-Boy Modelo 3000! V.A.T.S. te permite detener el tiempo durante un combate, marcar como objetivo partes específicas del cuerpo de tu enemigo, hacer un listado de ataques y dejar toda la agresión en manos de Vault-Tec. Reparte muerte y destrucción mediante una novedosa presentación cinemática   
    ¡Una impresionante inteligencia artificial!  En Vault-Tec sabemos que la llave al renacimiento de la civilización tras una guerra nuclear es la gente. Nuestras mejores mentes han aunado esfuerzos para producir una versión avanzada de la IA Radiant, la primera elección de América en simulación de interacciones humanas. Las expresiones faciales, los gestos, los diálogos únicos y los comportamientos realistas ofrecen resultados sorprendentes gracias a lo último en tecnología de Vault-Tec   
    ¡Una deslumbrante belleza!*:  Desde el árido Yermo, pasando por peligrosas oficinas y túneles de metro de DC, hasta la piel podrida de la cara de un mutante, serás testigo de la cruda realidad de un desastre nuclear renderizado como nunca con unos gráficos de lujo en alta definición         *Se recomienda protección ocular.

Les ingénieurs Vault-Tec ont travaillé 24 heures sur 24 pour vous apporter cette simulation post-apocalyptique. Monde complet, simulation de combat et effets visuels impressionnants : vous pourrez choisir parmi des tonnes d'options. Ce jeu est un combat permanent pour la survie contre les monstres, les mutants, les radiations et toutes les autres créatures hostiles. De Vault-Tec, la simulation post-nucléaire la plus prisée des Américains.
    Liberté sans limite !  Faites un tour dans ce monde ravagé. Vous reconnaîtrez les monuments connus au milieu des ruines. Il vous appartient de faire les bons choix pour survivre. Ne perdez pas de vue votre compteur Geiger !
    Faites l'expérience S.P.E.C.I.A.L.!  Les ingénieurs Vault-Tec vous apportent le meilleur de la personnalisation pour votre personnage. Des douzaines de spécialités sont également disponibles.
    Nouvelles vues fantastiques !  Les magiciens de chez Vault-Tec ont encore frappé. Perspective subjective comme à la troisième personnes sont disponibles. 
    Le pouvoir de choisir !  Serez-vous un bon samaritain ou un sale type ? Chaque situation peut être gérée de manière différente : la voie diplomatique ou celle du rayon plasma.  
    Pulvérisez-les avec V.A.T.S.!  Le système V.A.T.S. vous permet de faire des pauses dans les combats, de cibler des points spécifiques et de calibrer vos attaques. Semez la terreur et la destruction avec la classe cinématographique.
    Un intelligence artificielle à vous couper le souffle !  Chez Vault-Tec nous sommes conscients que les personnages qui peuplent cet univers sont la clef de voute de cette simulation post-apocalyptique. Expressions faciales, gestes, dialogues et comportements quotidiens ont été recréés avec une précision extrême. 
    Attention aux yeux !:  Le réalisme de ce jeu est tel que nous vous encourageons à porter des protections visuelles principalement pour vous protéger des projections de chair de mutants.

Die Ingenieure von Vault-Tec haben rund um die Uhr an einer interaktiven Reproduktion des postnuklearen Lebens im Ödland gearbeitet, die Sie aus der Sicherheit Ihres Bunkers heraus genießen können. Diese Simulation beinhaltet eine ausgedehnte Welt, einzigartige Kämpfe, eine schockierend realistische Optik, jede Menge Entscheidungsmöglichkeiten und eine unglaublich vielfältige Besetzung an verschiedenstartigen Charakteren. Jede Minute ist ein Kampf ums Überleben gegen die Schrecken der Außenwelt — Strahlung, Supermutanten und feindselige, mutierte Kreaturen. Von Vault-Tec, Amerikas erster Wahl in Sachen Postnuklear-Simulation.                    
 					   Grenzenlose Freiheit!  Genießen Sie die Bild- und Klangwelt des Haupt-Ödlands! Beobachten Sie die großen Denkmäler der Vereinigten Staaten bei ihrem postapokalyptischen Zerfall! Sie treffen die Entscheidungen, welche die Eigenschaften Ihres Charakters abstecken und die Welt verändern. Vergessen Sie nur nicht, ihr Strahlungsmessgerät im Auge zu behalten!                    
 					   Erleben Sie S.P.E.C.I.A.L.!  Die Ingenieure von Vault-Tec bieten Ihnen das Neueste an Fähigkeitssimulation - — das SPECIAL-Charaktersystem! Durch neue Durchbrüche in der punktebasierten Fähigkeitsdarstellung ermöglicht SPECIAL die unbegrenzte Anpassung Ihres Charakters. Hierzu zählen auch Dutzende von einzigartigen Fertigkeiten und Upgrades, aus denen es zu wählen gilt, jede einzelne mit einer umwerfenden Vielfalt an Effekten!                    
 					   Fantastische neue Aussichten!  Die Zauberer von Vault-Tec haben es wieder einmal geschafft! Seien Sie nicht länger an nur eine Perspektive gebunden und erleben Sie die Welt aus einer Ego- oder Drittpersonperspektive. Passen Sie die Ansicht mit einem einzigen Klick an Ihre Wünsche an!                     
 					   Die Macht der Wahl!  Fühlen Sie sich heute wie ein heimtückischer Bösewicht oder doch wie ein barmherziger Samariter? Entscheiden Sie sich für eine Seite oder wählen Sie den Mittelweg, denn mit jeder Situation kann auf eine Vielzahl an Wegen umgegangen werden. Bereden Sie Ihre Probleme auf zivilisierte Art und Weise oder lassen Sie Ihr Plasmagewehr sprechen.                     
 					   Blasen Sie Ihre Gegner mit V.A.T.S. weg!  Gleichen Sie die Chancen im Kampf mit Hilfe des Vault-Tec Assistierenden Trefferakquirier-Systems für Ihren Pip-Boy 3000 aus! V.A.T.S. erlaubt es Ihnen, den Kampf anzuhalten, spezifische Körperteile Ihres Gegners anzuvisieren, Angriffe hintereinanderzureihen und Vault-Tec Ihre Aggressionen nehmen zu lassen. Säen Sie Tod und Zerstörung in einer gänzlich neuen, kinoartigen Präsentation.                    
 					   Überwältigende künstliche Intelligenz!  Wir von Vault-Tec wissen, dass die Menschen der Schlüssel zur Wiederbelebung der Zivilisation nach einem globalen Atomkrieg sind. Daher haben sich unsere besten Köpfe zusammengesetzt und eine neue, hochentwickelte Version der Radiant AI entwickelt, Amerikas erster Wahl in Sachen Simulation menschlicher Interaktion. Gesichtsausdrücke, Gesten, einzigartige Dialogfähigkeiten und lebensechtes Verhalten werden dank der aktuellsten Vault-Tec-Technik zusammengebracht und ermöglichen so verblüffende Ergebnisse.                    
 					   Blendende Schönheit!*:  Werden Sie Zeuge der bitteren Folgen nuklearen Fallouts, dargestellt in noch nie zuvor dagewesener Luxus-HD-Grafikqualität, vom unwirtlichen Ödland über vor Gefahren nur so wimmelnde Büros und Metrotunnel Washington DCs bis hin zum abscheulichen Anblick eines Mutantengesichts.                           *Schutzbrille empfohlen.

Vault-Tec engineers have worked around the clock on an interactive reproduction of Wasteland life for you to enjoy from the comfort of your own vault. Included is an expansive world, unique combat, shockingly realistic visuals, tons of player choice, and an incredible cast of dynamic characters. Every minute is a fight for survival against the terrors of the outside world — radiation, Super Mutants, and hostile mutated creatures. From Vault-Tec, America's First Choice in Post Nuclear Simulation.                    
 					   Limitless Freedom!  Take in the sights and sounds of the vast Capital Wasteland! See the great monuments of the United States lying in post-apocalyptic ruin! You make the choices that define you and change the world. Just keep an eye on your Rad Meter!                    
 					   Experience S.P.E.C.I.A.L.!  Vault-Tec engineers bring you the latest in human ability simulation — the SPECIAL Character System! Utilizing new breakthroughs in points-based ability representation, SPECIAL affords unlimited customization of your character. Also included are dozens of unique skills and perks to choose from, each with a dazzling variety of effects!                    
 					   Fantastic New Views!  The wizards at Vault-Tec have done it again! No longer constrained to just one view, experience the world from 1st or 3rd person perspective. Customize your view with the touch of a button!                     
 					   The Power of Choice!  Feeling like a dastardly villain today, or a Good Samaritan? Pick a side or walk the line, as every situation can be dealt with in many different ways. Talk out your problems in a civilized fashion, or just flash your Plasma Rifle.                     
 					   Blast 'Em Away With V.A.T.S.!  Even the odds in combat with the Vault-Tec Assisted Targeting System for your Pip-Boy Model 3000! V.A.T.S. allows you to pause time in combat, target specific body parts on your target, queue up attacks, and let Vault-Tec take out your aggression for you. Rain death and destruction in an all-new cinematic presentation.                    
 					   Mind-Blowing Artificial Intelligence!  At Vault-Tec, we realize that the key to reviving civilization after a global nuclear war is people. Our best minds pooled their efforts to produce an advanced version of Radiant AI, America's First Choice in Human Interaction Simulation. Facial expressions, gestures, unique dialog, and lifelike behavior are brought together with stunning results by the latest in Vault-Tec technology.                    
 					   Eye-Popping Prettiness!*:  Witness the harsh realities of nuclear fallout rendered like never before in modern super-deluxe HD graphics. From the barren Wasteland, to the danger-filled offices and metro tunnels of DC, to the hideous rotten flesh of a mutant's face.                           *Protective Eyewear Encouraged.

Vault-Tecs teknikere har arbejdet døgnet rundt på en interaktiv gengivelse af livet i ødemarken, som du kan nyde i ro og mag fra dit eget kammer. Der medfølger en enorm verden, unik kamp, forbløffende realistisk grafik, tonsvis af valgmuligheder og en utrolig rolleliste med dynamiske karakterer. Hvert eneste minut er en kamp for overlevelse imod rædslerne i verden udenfor – stråling, supermutanter og fjendtligtsindede muterede skabninger. Fra Vault-Tec, Amerikas foretrukne skaber af postnuklear simulation.          
    Ubegrænset frihed!  Nyd seværdighederne og lydene i den enorme hovedstadsødemark! Se USAs store monumenter henkastet i postapokalyptisk ruin! Du træffer valgene, der definerer dig og forandrer verden. Bare sørg for at holde øje med din strålingsmåler!          
    Oplev S.P.E.C.I.A.L.!  Vault-Tecs teknikere giver dig det seneste inden for simulation af menneskelige evner – SPECIAL-karaktersystemet! Ved hjælp af nye gennembrud inden for pointbaseret færdighedsrepræsentation giver SPECIAL ubegrænsede muligheder for tilpasning af din karakter. Der medfølger desuden dusinvis af unikke færdigheder og fordele at vælge imellem – alle sammen med betagende effektvariationer!          
    Fantastiske nye synsvinkler!  Troldmændene hos Vault-Tec har gjort det igen! Nu er du ikke længere begrænset til bare en enkelt synsvinkel, men kan opleve verden i første eller tredje persons-perspektiv. Tilpas din synsvinkel ved et tryk på en knap!           
    Styrken ligger i det frie valg!  Føler du dig som en gemen skurk i dag eller en god samaritaner? Vælg side, eller lev livet på midten, da enhver situation kan håndteres på en lang række forskellige måder. Tal ud om problemerne på en civiliseret måde, eller hiv plasmariflen frem.           
    Skyd dem i småstykker med V.A.T.S.!  Du kan udligne oddsene i kamp ved hjælp af Vault-Tec Assisted Targeting System til din Pip-Boy Model 3000! V.A.T.S. gør det muligt stoppe tiden i kamp, gå efter specifikke kropsdele på målet, stille angrebene i kø og lade Vault-Tec udleve din aggression for dig. Lad død og ødelæggelse hagle ned i en helt ny filmisk form.          
    Ubegribelig kunstig intelligens!  Hos Vault-Tec er vi klar over, at nøglen til at genoplive civilisationen efter en global atomkrig er mennesker. Vores bedste hjerner har samarbejdet om at producere en avanceret version af Radiant AI, Amerikas foretrukne menneskeinteraktionssimulation. Ansigtsudtryk, fagter, unik dialog og realistisk adfærd kombineres med imponerende succes gennem det allerseneste inden for Vault-Tec-teknologi.          
    Ubegribelig skønhed!*:  Vær øjenvidne til det radioaktive nedfalds barske realiteter visualiseret som aldrig før i moderne super-deluxe HD-grafik. Fra den golde ødemark til de farefulde kontorer og metrotunneller i Washington DC til en mutants afskyelige, rådne ansigtskød.                 *Beskyttelsesbriller anbefales.

Vault-Tec engineers have worked around the clock on an interactive reproduction of Wasteland life for you to enjoy from the comfort of your own vault. Included is an expansive world, unique combat, shockingly realistic visuals, tons of player choice, and an incredible cast of dynamic characters. Every minute is a fight for survival against the terrors of the outside world — radiation, Super Mutants, and hostile mutated creatures. From Vault-Tec, America's First Choice in Post Nuclear Simulation.                    
 					   Limitless Freedom!  Take in the sights and sounds of the vast Capital Wasteland! See the great monuments of the United States lying in post-apocalyptic ruin! You make the choices that define you and change the world. Just keep an eye on your Rad Meter!

Utilizing new breakthroughs in points-based ability representation, SPECIAL affords unlimited customization of your character. Also included are dozens of unique skills and perks to choose from, each with a dazzling variety of effects!                    
 					   Fantastic New Views!  The wizards at Vault-Tec have done it again! No longer constrained to just one view, experience the world from 1st or 3rd person perspective. Customize your view with the touch of a button!
